name: Gontrill
description:
This game is going to be the first of a series of games made with an unique state-of-the-art technology and methodologies developed by our think tank dept. The game was tested only for Windows 10 though and currently the Android version is not ready, so we apologize if you have any trouble running on other OS.

Development is in an early stage so don't expect a polished game. We appreciate feedback about problems with the installation or execution of the game, crashes and other serious non-gameplay problems.
